description: Fails because of serial port permission denial - no way to fix this with GUI and no command line instructions available. A waste of my time
summary: Not obvious how to make this "simple" utility work

description:
Per online instructions, step 3 = "Open the document you want to fax and use its 'Print' command," step 4 = "Select the Fax icon in the list of printers.
Follow the prompts that appear, such as entering the recipient's number and the cover page, to send your fax."

Oh hey, guess what...there's no fax icon present in the list of printers. Uninstalling this app ten minutes after installing it.
Works in Ubuntu 20.04. Takes some setup. Not hard, just need to read documentation.
